item.title: GITLAB CICD TO DEPLOY AZURE FUNCTIONS
item.description: Introduction There are many ways to deploy Azure resources. Azure Portal - Click and follow the UI! Imperative ðŸš€ Use Az CLI ðŸš€ PowerShell ðŸš€ REST API etc. Declarative IaC â€“ Bicep,Terraform, Pulumi etc. The most commonly used method to provision Azure resources is with Infrastructure as Code, and the tool is your choice. I recommend using Bicep. But, for this blog post, I used Terraform because I have to demonstrate the remote state backend configuration.
